channel.title: User session time out configuration
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to change user session timeout, right now if I log in, I stay log in for too long. Anyone had this issue and how did you configure the timeout?
Thank you in advance
/Viktoria

item.title: User session time out configuration
item.dc:creator: andykim92
item.description:
FYI.
This was implemented via Expire sessions after 6 hours of inactivity by rauchy · Pull Request #5159 · getredash/redash · GitHub
Set the environment variable SESSION_EXPIRY_TIME to your liking. (The default is 60 * 60 * 6 (6 hours)
